name: webpack-sources
description: Source code handling classes for webpack

scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run beautify-lint
scripts.precover: npm run lint && npm run beautify-lint
scripts.publish-patch: npm test && npm version patch && git push && git push --tags && npm publish
